attributes.action: Give harlow riders a place to ride and wheelie
attributes.background: Teenagers in harlow are constantly getting stopped,arrested or warned  for wheeling in roads or public places, if the council give us a place to ride,it will reduce the number of us wheeling in roads. Wheeling is a sport and we have no where to practise our sport.We are not trying to hurt anyone.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. 

You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
